Articles.Content:
**KSP**: 1.0.2 Linux 64bit

**Problem**: Space center is gone. Sandbox and career.

**Mods installed**:

MechJeb latest dev

Kerbal engineer

HyperEdit

ModuleManager.2.6.2

KerbalAlarmClock

NRAP

spacey-lifters

And probably some more 

**What's happening:**

KSP crashed to desktop when I selected some debris and choose fly (Log-file search 'TestLander Debris'). I didn't save log file after that crash, damn. 

Now everytime I start KSP, it doesn't show space center anymore, just a background. See video. 

**Video:**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tQPuI3YlEPU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Log**:

Zipped file: [ksp.log](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwTO_H8RhTi0ZEFmci1GZFhMZ1U&authuser=0)

How to fix this, or is my career mode things lost.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T13:23:19Z" title="05/06/2015 01:23  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Lagopus**
I think you'll have to try a new save.

Besides the obvious 'Have you tried without the mods?' ' and 'Please upgrade all mods.', I did have a similar issue until I disabled some video settings (anti aliasing and SPFF i think).

Good luck.

> 
> Besides the obvious 'Have you tried without the mods?' ' and 'Please upgrade all mods.', I did have a similar issue until I disabled some video settings (anti aliasing and SPFF i think).
> Good luck.

Removing all mods solved this issue. I was too lazy to remove one at the time...
